Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package view.screens

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScreenFactory
    Factory Interface for building concrete Screen (factory pattern)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardScreen
    Logic view of the Board.
    BoardScreenBuilder
    Builder for the BoardScreen
    ConnectionErrorScreen
    In this screen is displayed a connection error message
    ConnectionScreen
    This screen asks to the user to insert an IP, a port, a nickname and the number of players.
    CreditsScreen
    This screen should display the credits of the game From this screen it's possible to: - Go back to the MenuScreen
    GodSelectionScreen
    This screen should display all the choosable gods of the game The first player can select two or three gods (according to the number of players) then he can submit the choices and move the game to the PickGodScreen
    GodSelectionScreenBuilder
    Screen Builder for the GodSelectionScreen
    MenuScreen
    This screen should display the menu of the game From this screen it's possible to:
    PickGodScreen
    In this screen all god chosen in the GodSelectionPhase should be displayed.
    PickGodScreenBuilder
    Screen Builder for the PickGodScreen
    Screen
    A generic screen of the view (every screen of the view must extend this class) The screen is a View and gets messages from the server through the server listeners
    ScreenBuilder
    A screen builder saves the initial parameters for the next screen, and then when the buildScreen() method is called builds and returns the next screen object, using the provided ScreenFactory
    WinnerScreen
    Screen where the results of the finished game are shown
    WinnerScreenBuilder
    Builds the WinnerScreen
